amendment.description: To encourage the Government of Indonesia to meet the conditions necessary for the normalization of military relations with the United States.

action.text: Senate vitiated previous adoption of amendment SA 2004 by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2004 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2004 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. To encourage the Government of Indonesia to meet the conditions necessary for the normalization of military relations with the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2004 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
